about_the_game: Fight for honor on the Frontier in Titanfall 2 with Ronin Prime. This samurai-inspired chassis changes the shape of the Ronin Titan, also unlocking new sound effects and a devastating execution. With your new Ronin Prime, your enemies will fall like delicate cherry blossoms!
detailed_description: Fight for honor on the Frontier in Titanfall 2 with Ronin Prime. This samurai-inspired chassis changes the shape of the Ronin Titan, also unlocking new sound effects and a devastating execution. With your new Ronin Prime, your enemies will fall like delicate cherry blossoms!
name: Titanfall™ 2: Ronin Prime
short_description: Get Ronin Prime today to give your Ronin a new samurai-inspired look, unique sound effects and a new execution.
